content.text:
# 2024 Queen's Club Championships

/ 16
| surface = Grass
| category=ATP Tour 500 series
| prize_money=€2,255,655
| location=London, United Kingdom
| venue=Queen's Club
| champs= Tommy Paul
| champd= Neal Skupski /  Michael Venus
| main_name=Queen's Club Championships
}}
The '''2024 Queen's Club Championships (also known as the Cinch Championships''' for sponsorship reasons) was a men's professional tennis tournament played on outdoor grass courts at the Queen's Club in London, United Kingdom from 17 to 23 June 2024. It was the 121st edition of the event and is classified as an ATP Tour 500 tournament on the 2024 ATP Tour.
Champions
Singles
*  Tommy Paul def.  Lorenzo Musetti, 6–1, 7–6(10–8)
Doubles
*  Neal Skupski /  Michael Venus def.  Taylor Fritz /  Karen Khachanov, 4–6, 7–6(7–5), [10–8]

Other entrants
The following players received wildcards into the main draw:
*  Dan Evans
*  Billy Harris
*  Andy Murray
The following player received entry using a protected ranking:
*  Milos Raonic
The following player received entry as a special exempt:
*  Brandon Nakashima
The following players received entry from the qualifying draw:
*  Taro Daniel
*  Rinky Hijikata
*  Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard
*  Alexei Popyrin
Withdrawals
*  Jiří Lehečka → replaced by  Matteo Arnaldi

Other entrants
The following pairs received wildcards into the doubles main draw:
*  Jack Draper /  Cameron Norrie
*  Dan Evans /  Andy Murray
The following pair received entry from the qualifying draw:
*  Julian Cash /  Robert Galloway
The following pairs received entry as lucky losers:
*  Alexander Erler /  Lucas Miedler
*  John Peers /  Jordan Thompson
Withdrawals
*  Dan Evans /  Andy Murray → replaced by  John Peers /  Jordan Thompson
*  Máximo González /  Andrés Molteni → replaced by  Francisco Cerúndolo /  Tomás Martín Etcheverry
*  Frances Tiafoe /  Tommy Paul → replaced by  Alexander Erler /  Lucas Miedler
